title: Something Evil e-book
description:
This is a novel I wrote a few years ago. It is available at Smashwords (https://www.smashwords.com/books/view/44697) where you can set your own price from free to whatever and at Amazon.

I offer it here for free. 

If you like it, please rate/review it at Amazon or smashwords or both.

If you liked it enough to make a donation for it, that would be greatly appreciated. You can set your price at Smashwords.

If you are great at design and want to donate time/work to help with a great cover--that would be greatly appreciated also.

Ray has no way of knowing that within just a day he will be fighting to survive as SOMETHING EVIL tears everyone around him to pieces
